tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
At the very outset Dr. Kumra makes you feel at ease and comfortable. She explains the problem and diagnosis with clarity and uses easy to understand terminology. 
Besides taking care of the problematic teeth, she advises on preventive measures, maintenance and hygiene of your teeth. This is a very unique aspect of Dr Kumra's practice. It is very rare that a doctor spends time for such advice. 
Dr Kundra is very soft spoken and gentle which made me feel comfortable and confident that I had come to the right place. 
Last but not the least , her clinic is spotlessly clean with very high standard of hygiene.  And her staff is very well trained for their respective assignments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been coming to the clinic for the past 3-4 years. Everytime i visit from the UK, i always come to the clinic for a checkup and teeth whitening. I prefer it more than UK dental care system. The clinic is very supportive and client friendly and they ensure that their client is getting the best treatment. The doctor is very sweet and polite, she explains everything in detail before carrying forward any kind of procedure. The clinic is not only well maintained with good staff *** ********* *** **** ** *** ** *** **** * **** **** ***

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,

I will highly recommend her.

review:
She was ever smiling, described the steps simultaneously while carrying on procedure. Very confident. Teaching the staff nurse and Doctors simultaneously. Taking response of the patient throughout while carrying on procedure, making the patient(myself) at ease and comfortable.

Wonderful experience !!

Got my scaling and polishing procedure done by Dr. Utkarsha under the supervision of Dr. Kumra. She ensured that I was comfortable during the procedure and it was completely painless. They also educated me about the correct ways to maintain my oral hygiene for a healthier mouth in the long term.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Every time I visit Dr. Kumra, I get to see her efficiency and expertise. Which is terrific.

She is also a very hard task master. Her juniors keep getting stern instructions from her on their methods. This is how they get better in their work. She is a not just an excellent dental practitioner; she is also a wonderful teacher. As a teacher myself, I should probably use some of her methods on my students‚Ä¶

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent and pleasant experience as always! Dr. Kumra is my go to dentist and her clinic is super neat, clean and spacious and all covid protocols are being strictly followed.

My family and I only trust her and her clinic especially during these unprecendented times. 

Her staff is also super nice and friendly. Would highly recommend Smayate Dental Clinic and Dr. Kumra to everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: had 3 teeth extracted and at the same time implants put in  . Got this done in the middle of the second wave of the covid pendamic.  It was amazing that all care was taken to keep me and the doctors and the assistants safe from exposure to any thing. Whats more is that ive recovered from the surgery and can't wait to get the teeth put in. Thank you Dr Kumra, for your patience and the excellent care.

review: Doctor Kumra is extremely kind and very patient. I cried for over an hour the day I got to know I had to get a root canal treatment done but she assured me that it won't hurt and the treatment actually was very smooth. She's an excellent doctor with a very pretty smile..

review: I have always been scared to visit dentists.. But I was made so comfortable there that I forgot about the whole mindset of having pain rather enjoyed how I got to know about my own tooth and oral hygiene..The staff was really friendly and took care of safety in Corona times.. The doctor was patient enough to hear me out..In all.. Wonderful experience..

We go a long way, she is very precise and good at what she does.I have great confidence  with her as my dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: It is her in-depth manner of explaining the he problem that anyone can easily understand. She did the complete treatment which required just two visits. I have been to dentists before but this was a completely different experience. She spent so much time on explaining the issue and treating it. I would recommend everyone to do visit her. You would get a detailed analysis of your current status for all your teeth. Don't wait for the problem to occur, identify the problem before it occurs.
